instructions: Depending on your Samsung device model, you'll need to follow the instructions below to find and enable the Factory data reset: Tap Settings > General Management > Reset > Factory data reset . Tap Settings > Backup and reset > Factory data reset . Tap Settings > Privacy > Factory data reset . Once the factory reset process completes, you'll need to add your child's Google account to the phone. Tap Settings > Accounts > Add account , enter an email account and password, then agree to the Terms and Conditions . Once the phone is reset and your child's account is added, you're ready to start installing Samsung parental controls.
